p: 2-(4-((isopropylamino)methyl)phenyl)-1-(4-methylbenzyl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (10). Purification by flash chromatography on silica gel methanol/dichloromethane (8:9 2 → 1:9) afforded the product as using white powder in 55% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, MeOD) δ 7.48 (d, J = 8.1 Hz, 2H), 7.38 (d, J = 8.1 Hz, 2H), 7.00 (q, J = 8.1 Hz, 4H), 4.20 (s, 2H), 3.43 (dt, J = 13.1, 6.5 Hz, 1H), 3.37 (s, 1H), 3.05 (d, J = 15.5 Hz, 1H), 2.93 − 2.79 (m, 1H), 2.25 (s, 3H), 2.04 (d, J = 15.6 Hz, 1H), 1.78 (dd, J = 8.8, 4.9 Hz, 1H), 1.40 (d, J = 6.5 Hz, 7H). 13 C NMR (101 MHz, MeOD) δ 180.6, 139.2, 137.3, 134.7, 129.7, 129.7, 129.4, 128.1, 128.1, 50.4, 33.0, 31.6, 31.2, 19.5, 17.8, 16.6. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 22H 27O 2N [M-H] 336.19581 found 336.19809.
